body:
Hey guys, today im here to talk to you about someone that has been helping the server simultaneously.
This person is persistent and always finishes his job, he helps others with maps and even provide assistance. This person is ParaSpider, i believe he should be a moderator once again as the way hes been acting. Although hes done things in the past, lets think about the future. He has made and helped with MANY maps and will encourage more people to do so in the future with amazing content! He helps people, is nice has the stamina to do work and finish the job! I think he has the time and work ethic to be a splendid moderator on this server. So in conclusion I would like to say #ParaFoMod2014. 

Thanks you all for reading, and enjoy your day! :)
- Slicorn

title: For the servers benefits. ParaSpider.

replies.body: Para has done some awesome work. He's contributed a lot :D

replies.body: I think he definitely deserves Jr. Mod again.

replies.body: I think he deserves it, but the time I've known him, I've only seen inmature actions from him
